name: Delivery Planning Report
query:
Select d.transporter, d.customer, d.item_code, d.item_name, d.ordered_qty, d.qty_to_deliver, d.delivery_date, 
dn.name, dn.posting_date,
p.name, p.total_weight
from `tabDelivery Planning Item` d
join `tabDelivery Note` dn ON d.customer = dn.customer 
join `tabPick List` p ON d.customer = p.customer

where d.approved = "Yes"
